snippet: France’s national rail company, SNCF, filed suit after cyclists in the Paris-Roubaix race crossed tracks on Sunday just before a high-speed train passed.
abstract: French national rail company SNCF files lawsuit after cyclists in Paris-Roubaix race crossed train tracks just seconds before passage of high-speed train.
lead_paragraph: France’s national rail company, SNCF, filed suit after cyclists in the Paris-Roubaix race crossed tracks on Sunday just before a high-speed train passed.

headline.main: Rail Company Sues Over Close Call in Bicycle Race
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Cycling; Rail Company Files Suit

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: SNCF (Societe Nationale des Chemins de fer Francais)
